name: INVOICE_APC
description: The INVOICE_APC table contains information on payment classifications.

columns.name: INVOICE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the invoice record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number of the payment classification type for this invoice record.

columns.name: PC_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The type of payment classification that appears on the invoice (i.e. CPTï¿½, APC, etc.)

columns.name: PC_CODE
columns.description: The payment classification code that appears on the invoice.

columns.name: PC_MODIFIER
columns.description: The payment classification modifier that appears on the invoice.

columns.name: PC_SERVICE_DATE
columns.description: The service date the services were performed on.

columns.name: PC_PMT_STAT_IND_C_NAME
columns.description: The status indicator for this payment classification.
entries: E (Not Allowed under APC or Not Covered)
C (Inpatient Services Not Payable under APC)
B (Not Recognized by OPPS for Part B)
Q (Packaged Services Subject to Separate Payment)
Q3 (Codes paid through a composite APC)
J1 (Services paid through a comprehensive APC)
J2 (Services that may be paid through a comprehensive APC)
E1 (Items and services not covered by Medicare)
E2 (Items and services without price or claim data)

columns.name: PC_ETR_LIST
columns.description: The transaction record that appears on the invoice.

columns.name: PC_ORIG_REIMB_AMT
columns.description: The payment classification reimbursement amount that appears on the invoice.

columns.name: PC_REIMB_AMT
columns.description: The payment classification expected reimbursement amount that appears on the invoice.

columns.name: PC_QUANTITY
columns.description: The payment classification quantity that appears on the invoice.
